quote1.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quote1.author: Thomas Edison

quote2.text: You can observe a lot just by watching.
quote2.author: Yogi Berra

quote3.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
quote3.author: Carl Sandburg

quote6.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quote6.author: Buddha

quote7.text: Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.
quote7.author: Lao Tzu

quote8.text: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quote8.author: Benjamin Spock

quote9.text: Well done is better than well said.
quote9.author: Benjamin Franklin

quote10.text: One today is worth two tomorrows.
quote10.author: Benjamin Franklin

quote11.text: God always takes the simplest way.
quote11.author: Albert Einstein

quote12.text: Be as you wish to seem.
quote12.author: Socrates

quote13.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quote13.author: Larry Elder

quote14.text: The best teacher is experience learned from failures.
quote14.author: Byron Pulsifer

quote15.text: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
quote15.author: John Lennon

quote16.text: Skill to do comes of doing.
quote16.author: Ralph Emerson

quote17.text: I believe that every person is born with talent.
quote17.author: Maya Angelou

quote18.text: Great talent finds happiness in execution.
quote18.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote19.text: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quote19.author: Leo Tolstoy

quote20.text: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
quote20.author: Buddha
